\begin{tikzpicture}[trim axis left, trim axis right]
  \pgfplotsset{
    %width=8cm,
    y axis style/.style={
      yticklabel style=#1,
      ylabel style=#1,
      y axis line style=#1,
      ytick style=#1
    },
    x axis style/.style={
      xticklabel style=#1,
      xlabel style=#1,
      x axis line style=#1,
      xtick style=#1
    }
  }
  \begin{loglogaxis}[
      axis x line*=bottom,
      x axis style = cbred,
      axis y line*=left,
      y axis style = cbred,
      xlabel = {Separation $\abs{\vb{d}}$ (\tikz{\pgfuseplotmark{triangle*}}, \si{\micro\meter})},
      ylabel = {$\Delta \abs{\vb{v}_\text{max}}$ (\tikz{\pgfuseplotmark{triangle*}}, relative)},
      width=0.85\columnwidth
    ]

    \addplot[
      cbred,
      only marks,
      mark=triangle*,
      mark size = 2.5
    ] table {separation_scaling.dat};

    \addplot[
      cbred,
      opacity=0.6,
      domain=4:128
    ] {0.250754*x^-3.00077};
  \end{loglogaxis}

  \begin{loglogaxis}[
      axis x line*=top,
      x axis style = cbblue,
      axis y line*=right,
      y axis style = cbblue,
      xlabel = {Radius (\tikz{\pgfuseplotmark{*}}, $\si{\micro\meter}$)},
      ylabel = {$\Delta\abs{\vb{v}_\text{max}}$ (\tikz{\pgfuseplotmark{*}}, relative)},
      ylabel style = {rotate=-180},
      width=0.85\columnwidth
    ]
    \addplot[
      cbblue,
      only marks,
      mark size=0.4ex
    ] table {radius_scaling.dat};

    \addplot[
      cbred,
      domain=0.5:5,
      opacity=1,
    ] {0.0000313328*x^2.99814};
  \end{loglogaxis}
\end{tikzpicture}
